articles.author: Colleen Goko and Khuleko Siwele
articles.title: News24 | Rand gains as investors bet Zuma is out, DA in for coalition government
articles.description: South African assets are rebounding, fuelled by investor hopes that the country will emerge from the next 13 days of coalition talks with a market-friendly government.
articles.content:
• Investors are hoping that the country will emerge from the next 13 days of coalition talks with a market-friendly government.
  • Assets are rebounding and the rand has improved.
